title: Labour MP ‘receives death threats’ after Tory MP posts video on grooming gangs inquiry
summary: Anna Dixon accuses fellow West Yorkshire MP Robbie Moore of sharing misinformation about her position on issue A Labour MP has said she has been subjected to death threats and online misogynistic abuse after a video was shared by a Conservative MP about her position on a national inquiry into grooming gangs. Anna Dixon, the MP for Shipley in West Yorkshire, said police are investigating the threats and has accused the MP for Keighley and Ilkley, Robbie Moore, of disseminating “misinformation” about her stance on the issue. Continue reading...

title: High stakes diplomacy and canceled Halibut Olympia, insights from the Alaska Summit
summary: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly, who has covered her share of high stakes diplomatic meetings between some of the world's most powerful people, spoke with Scott Detrow about what was different during the recent Trump-Putin Alaska Summit.
